name: Major Paved Road
description: A well-maintained highway provides fast and reliable transportation for trade and military movement. The strategic importance makes it a target for bandits and military control, while the reliable surface allows year-round travel.
atmosphere: Well-maintained stone highway carries constant traffic of merchants, pilgrims, and official messengers while mile markers indicate distances to major cities. The smooth surface allows rapid travel in all weather as guard posts provide security. Essential artery of commerce and communication connecting civilization's major centers.
